sentences.en: A new backfire antenna fed by a bifilar backfire belix is described in this Paper.
sentences.cn: 本文提出一种用双线背射螺旋作馈源的新式背射天线.

sentences.en: A victory for Mr Bush and the internationalists could easily backfire.
sentences.cn: 胜利,对于布什总统和国际主义者来说,极容易事与愿违.

sentences.en: Backfire: The imbedded psionic effect targets the user instead of its intended target.
sentences.cn: 倒戈: 内蕴的灵能效果将以使用者为目标而非指定目标.

sentences.en: But its brutish behaviour will probably backfire.
sentences.cn: 但是这种鲁莽行为可能让俄国自食其果.

sentences.en: But telling a stranger too much about your assets and achievements can backfire.
sentences.cn: 但是向陌生人过多地讲自己的财产和成就会产生不良影响.

sentences.en: But the ploy could backfire by alienating working women.
sentences.cn: 可是这种攻击伎俩可能回让职业妇女反感,而收到反效果.

sentences.en: Don't criticize the students or it may backfire on you.
sentences.cn: 不要总是批评学生,否则,物极必反.

sentences.en: Even assuming it's the latter, though, this bit of PR could backfire.
sentences.cn: 即便是后者, 小范围的限价也会适得其反.

sentences.en: Here are three ways to guarantee that all the marketing you've done will backfire on you.
sentences.cn: 如何能确保不犯这三个可怕的错误呢?只有许下能做到的诺言,并遵守许下的诺言. 就 是 这么简单.

sentences.en: However, this approach can backfire if it triggers a price cutting spiral.
sentences.cn: 然而事与愿违的是, 这条途径可能引发商家竞相降价.

sentences.en: Secret affairs will eventually backfire on you.
sentences.cn: 秘密的事情最终会发生在你身上.

sentences.en: The Backfire effect on the " Net - O - Matic " will no longer break on damage.
sentences.cn: 工程网网到自己(走火)的效果不会被伤害打断.

sentences.en: The company’s new policy backfired when a number of employees threatened to quit.
sentences.cn: 公司的新政策事与愿违，有好几名员工威胁说要辞职。
总统的策略可能会适得其反。

sentences.en: This logic can backfire, as in the case of Beijing Auto and Germany's Opel.
sentences.cn: 这种逻辑可能适得其反, 在北京汽车和德国欧宝的案例中.

sentences.en: Your comments may backfire and cause you a lot of trouble.
sentences.cn: 你的评论可能产生出乎意料的后果并给你带来很多麻烦.

trans.tran_cn: 放出逆火；预先放火；产生出乎意料及事与愿违的结果
trans.tran_en: if a plan or action backfires, it has the opposite effect to the one you intended

trans.tran_cn: 发生回火，适得其反，事与愿违的结果
